pages.text: While exploring I found a strange object that seemed to radiate an unknown form of energy. There are two colours of these 'anomalies', blue anomalies, which appear shortly after sunrise; and red anomalies, which appear near sunset.

After a few days, anomalies disappear naturally. I suspect it may be possible to prevent or hasten this event.$(2br)My next step is to find a way to focus the power of the anomalies. I will leave samples of candidate materials near both kinds of anomaly. Redstone, lapis, glowstone, and gold seem like good candidates to start with.
